# count

**Instance Property**

The number of quantities contained in this sample.

## Declaration

```swift
var count: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

Samples created using one of the `init()` methods have a [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantitySample/count] of `1`. Samples created using an [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantitySeriesSampleBuilder] may have a [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantitySample/count] greater than `1`.

## Related Documentation

- **HKQuantitySeriesSampleQuery**: A query that accesses the series data associated with a quantity sample.

## Getting Property Data

- **quantity**: The quantity for this sample.
- **quantityType**: The quantity type for this sample.
